turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. which starbucks would you like me to place an order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on Horsham Road h o r s h a m in Horsham, PA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a salted caramel mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: was that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want another milk type, or should i keep it to the standard whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The whole milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. did you need anything else from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so 1 venti hot salted caramel mocha with whole milk from starbucks on horsham road in horsham, pennsylvania will come out to $4.50. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed your order. it'll be ready in 10 mins for pick up. the receipt will b sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, good bye now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
